text: Frankenstein is a 1910 American silent horror movie directed by J. Searle DawleyFrankenstein (1910)FRANKENSTEIN and stars Mary Fuller, Charles Stanton Ogle, and Augustus Phillips. ==Actors== * Mary Fuller as Elizabeth * Charles Stanton Ogle as The Monster * Augustus Phillips as Frankenstein ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 movies Category:1910s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American silent movies
title: Frankenstein (1910 movie)
